rooms.description: North-facing entrance with floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light, aligning with Vastu for positive energy flow.

Open plan living and dining space with Mediterranean aesthetic touches like terracotta tiles and warm wood finishes. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light, designed to face north for enhanced energy flow.
Modern kitchen integrated into the living area with Mediterranean design elements. Functional and efficient layout incorporating a central island.
Compact servant quarters placed adjacent to the main entrance for convenience and privacy. Designed with Vastu considerations in mind.
